item.description:
Although I have not read the book, I hear it is a great story.   Hopefully they will be able to translate it well onto the big screen.

The Showtime is 6:35 we are seeing the 3D version.   I will get there as soon as I can....probably by 5:45.  We will head in for seats by 6:10.  

Please note:  They have been doing this weird thing where they make people line up in the lobby for some movies before letting them upstairs.  I am hoping that since this is not opening weekend they won't do this for this film.   If they do, just get in line when you get there and then head for the tables by the windows at the top of the escalator.  If they let you go upstairs then go straight to the table area.  The group will head in for seats by 6:10.   We are usually pretty easy to spot...look for a big group and me with my lovely meetup pin.

Although this is not opening weekend, this film did get lots of good reviews.  I suggest you get your tickets ahead of time!  You can buy them on Fandango.com.

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after. We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in, to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

$$$$Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after.$$$$$

Movie Details:

Release Date: November 21, 2012 (3D/2D theaters)
Studio: 20th Century Fox
Director:Ang Lee
Screenwriter:David Magee
Starring:Tobey Maguire, Suraj Sharma, Irffan Khan, Gerard Depardieu, Adil Hussain
Genre: Drama
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: LifeofPimovie.com

Plot Summary: Director Ang Lee ("Brokeback Mountain," "Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon") creates a groundbreaking movie event about a young man who survives a tragic disaster at sea and is hurtled into an epic journey of adventure and discovery. While marooned on a lifeboat, he forms an amazing and unexpected connection with the ship's only other survivor -- a fearsome Bengal tiger.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. The movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalators.
